main event: Two shiny, silvery objects were observed in a circular flight path over Diedesfeld, Germany on July 29, 1954.
interesting points: The objects were described as round and disc-like in shape.
The objects flew in formation for about 15 seconds.
The total observation time was around 4 minutes.
The objects were observed while jets were also active in the area.
The objects hovered over cloud layers.
